pageContent: Objective: We performed a 2 year longitudinal survey of health-related quality of life (HRQOL) after radical retropubic prostatectomy (RP) in Japanese men with localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Radioactive iodine-125 implantation for cancer of the prostate
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/4039436/
